reviewText: This is a must have book for beginner and Intermediate level MLThe book is neatly organized - and starts with simple things explains the problem the different aprpoaches/algorithms are trying to solve with neat working Python based examples.This book to some extent will also get you into NumPy and get a good idea of usages of NumPy in solving ML problems.The author is knowledgable and has a good writing style and makes the right tradeoffs at the right points in terms of technicality and mathematics.I would highly recommend this book for people who need a good sold background on ML and how to get projects related to ML going
title: Machine Learning in Action
